Module.Name: Air concentration distributions
Module.Description: Air (indoor, outdoor) concentration distributions are specified by a mean, cv and distribution type (lognormal). Specify the occurrence percentage as the percentage of samples that has positive concentrations.
Module.ShortDescription: Air concentration distributions data are data on analytical measurements of chemical substances occurring in air (indoor, outdoor) samples.
Module.CalculationDescription: Air concentration distributions are computed from air (indoor, outdoor) concentrations data.
Module.DataDescription: Air concentration distributions data can be entered using the internal, relational data format.
